about_the_game:
Hey there! Thank you for considering supporting Fap Queen!

I want to make very clear that this DLC is a single "thank you" picture, and nothing else! It doesn't enhance the game or anything like this, it is a simple picture at the start of the game, featuring the Queen and the Succubus. Together. Like... closely together. (The screenshot of the DLC is just part of the picture, the actual picture shows more)

I created this DLC to help me recovering the costs of creating the game. Yes I know this is a very small game, but I had some expenses with it and it would be nice to recover those. If it becomes a wild success, then Fap Queen 2 could be a thing. If not, then well, it was fun anyways :D

Thank you again for playing the game and considering supporting!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC is just a single picture featuring 2 anime ladies in a rather intimate position.

detailed_description:
Hey there! Thank you for considering supporting Fap Queen!

I want to make very clear that this DLC is a single "thank you" picture, and nothing else! It doesn't enhance the game or anything like this, it is a simple picture at the start of the game, featuring the Queen and the Succubus. Together. Like... closely together. (The screenshot of the DLC is just part of the picture, the actual picture shows more)

I created this DLC to help me recovering the costs of creating the game. Yes I know this is a very small game, but I had some expenses with it and it would be nice to recover those. If it becomes a wild success, then Fap Queen 2 could be a thing. If not, then well, it was fun anyways :D

Thank you again for playing the game and considering supporting!
name: Fap Queen Support DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integral graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: none
  • Additional Notes: This is just a picture.

short_description: Just a simple picture featuring the Queen and the Succubus. By purchasing this, you help supporting the game!
